institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 27 (Use of general operating expenses, etc.)
contents: Article 27 (Use of general operating expenses, etc.) The business group shall use the general operating expenses, training facility and equipment costs, and program development expenses supported pursuant to Article 19 (1) 3 and Annex 5 of the Operation Regulations directly with industry-led training projects in accordance with Annex 3 of the Rules. It must be used for related purposes.
